name: steal the sweets!
description:
Get as much candy from these stinkin' kids as you can!!! Move with WASD or the arrow keys and use your wind powers with the space bar.

Background music is Norbert Schenk's rendition of Johann Sebastian Bach's Toccata and Fugue in D minor, which can be found here. This recording is under a CC BY 4.0 license.  All other audio not created by me is under a Creative Commons 0 License, and all of it was found at freesound.org. 

Big thanks to the playtesters for this game - Neil Kimball, Chris Lawrence, and Naomi Foss!! 

Note: Depending on your graphics card and which browser you're using this game may not play and appear as just an orange rectangle because of the way UnityWebGL works :-(
